title: Suspicious Explorer Process with Whitespace Padding
description: Detects a known 2025/2026 technique (ClickFix/FileFix) where 'explorer.exe' is launched with extra spaces to evade simple command-line filters.
code:
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        Image|endswith: '\explorer.exe'
        CommandLine|contains: '   '
    condition: selection
level: high
author: SigmaHQ

title: 2026 AI-Generated Phishing HTML
description: Detects structural patterns common in high-fidelity phishing kits seen in early 2026 that use AI to bypass standard keyword filters.
code:
rule AI_Phish_Kit_2026 {
    meta:
        description = "Detects advanced 2026 phishing structures"
        author = "ThreatNet Ops"
    strings:
        $obf1 = /<script>eval\(atob\(['"]/ 
        $css1 = "display: none; visibility: hidden;" 
        $hook = "rest/v1/auth/login"
    condition:
        2 of them
}
author: Community

title: Kerberoasting via RC4 TGS Floods
description: Detects Silent Kerberoasting attempts using weak RC4 encryption.
code:
logsource:
    product: windows
    service: security
detection:
    selection:
        EventID: 4769
        TicketOptions: '0x40810000'
        TicketEncryptionType: '0x17'
    condition: selection
level: medium
author: SEC4U

title: Mshta Executing Remote Script
description: Detects mshta.exe executing remote payloads, a common malware loader technique.
code:
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        Image|endswith: '\mshta.exe'
        CommandLine|contains:
            - 'http'
            - 'https'
    condition: selection
level: high
author: ThreatNet Ops

title: PowerShell Encoded Command Execution
description: Detects PowerShell executions using Base64-encoded commands.
code:
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        Image|endswith: '\powershell.exe'
        CommandLine|contains:
            - '-enc'
            - '-encodedcommand'
    condition: selection
level: high
author: SigmaHQ

title: Cloud Admin API Token Used from New ASN
description: Detects suspicious cloud admin token usage from new ASNs.
code:
logsource:
    category: cloud
    product: generic
detection:
    selection:
        role: 'admin'
    condition: selection
level: high
author: Community

title: Linux Cron Persistence Backdoor
description: Detects malicious cron jobs used for persistence.
code:
rule Linux_Cron_Backdoor {
    meta:
        description = "Detects cron-based persistence backdoors"
        author = "Community"
    strings:
        $cron1 = "* * * * *" 
        $curl = "curl -s" nocase
        $wget = "wget -q" nocase
        $pipe = "| sh" nocase
    condition:
        2 of them
}
author: Community

title: Ransomware Pre-Encryption Shadow Copy Deletion
description: Detects shadow copy deletion commonly executed by ransomware.
code:
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        CommandLine|contains:
            - 'vssadmin delete shadows'
            - 'wmic shadowcopy delete'
            - 'bcdedit /set {default} recoveryenabled no'
    condition: selection
level: critical
author: SigmaHQ

title: Linux Ransomware ELF Payload
author: Community

title: Ransomware Shadow Copy and Recovery Deletion
description: Detects commands commonly executed by ransomware to remove backups and disable recovery before encryption.
code:
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        CommandLine|contains:
            - 'vssadmin delete shadows'
            - 'wmic shadowcopy delete'
            - 'bcdedit /set {default} recoveryenabled no'
            - 'bcdedit /set {default} bootstatuspolicy ignoreallfailures'
    condition: selection
level: critical
author: SigmaHQ

title: Linux and ESXi Ransomware VM Termination
description: Detects ESXi-focused ransomware stopping virtual machines prior to encryption.
code:
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: linux
detection:
    selection:
        CommandLine|contains:
            - 'esxcli vm process kill'
            - 'vim-cmd vmsvc/power.off'
    condition: selection
level: critical
author: Community

title: PowerShell Encoded Malware Execution
description: Detects obfuscated PowerShell execution commonly used by modern malware loaders.
code:
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        Image|endswith: '\powershell.exe'
        CommandLine|contains:
            - '-enc'
            - '-encodedcommand'
    condition: selection
level: high
author: SigmaHQ

title: LSASS Credential Dump Attempt
description: Detects access to LSASS memory, a strong indicator of credential dumping by malware or ransomware operators.
code:
logsource:
    category: process_access
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        TargetImage|endswith: '\lsass.exe'
    condition: selection
level: high
author: SigmaHQ

title: Suspicious PsExec Lateral Movement
description: Detects use of PsExec for lateral movement, commonly seen in ransomware intrusions.
code:
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        Image|endswith: '\psexec.exe'
    condition: selection
level: high
author: Community

title: Registry Run Key Persistence
description: Detects malware establishing persistence via Windows Run registry keys.
code:
logsource:
    category: registry_event
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        TargetObject|contains: 'CurrentVersion\\Run'
    condition: selection
level: medium
author: SigmaHQ

title: Suspicious Data Exfiltration via Curl
description: Detects potential data exfiltration using curl to external servers.
code:
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: linux
detection:
    selection:
        Image|endswith: '/curl'
        CommandLine|contains:
            - '-X POST'
            - '--data'
    condition: selection
level: high
author: Community

title: Generic Ransomware Encryption Routine
description: Detects hybrid AES/RSA encryption logic common across modern ransomware families.
code:
rule Ransomware_Generic_Encrypt_2026 {
    meta:
        description = "Generic ransomware encryption detection"
        author = "ThreatNet Ops"
    strings:
        $aes = "AES_encrypt" nocase
        $rsa = "RSA_public_encrypt" nocase
        $note = "YOUR FILES HAVE BEEN ENCRYPTED" nocase
    condition:
        2 of them
}
author: ThreatNet Ops

title: AI Obfuscated Malware Loader
description: Detects malware loaders using AI-generated variable entropy and runtime decoding.
code:
rule AI_Malware_Loader_2026 {
    meta:
        description = "AI-assisted malware loader detection"
        author = "ThreatNet Ops"
    strings:
        $entropy = /var [a-zA-Z]{25,40} = \[/
        $decode = "String.fromCharCode" nocase
        $eval = "eval(" nocase
    condition:
        filesize < 400KB and 2 of them
}
author: ThreatNet Ops
